details: Greece officially the Hellenic Republic is a country located in Southeast Europe.

Greece has the longest coastline in Europe and is the southernmost country in Europe. The mainland has rugged mountains, forests, and lakes, but the country is well known for the thousands of islands dotting the blue Aegean Sea to the east, the Mediterranean Sea to the south, and the Ionian Sea to the west.
Malé island and atoll, capital of Maldives, in the Indian Ocean. It lies on Male Atoll, about 400 miles (645 km) southwest of Sri Lanka.
London is the capital and largest city of England and the United Kingdom.
New Delhi, national capital of India. It is situated in the north-central part of the country on the west bank of the Yamuna River,
Thimphu, also spelled Thimbu, capital of Bhutan. The city, situated in the west-central part of the country

Kuala Lumpur, officially the Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, or commonly known as KL, is the national capital of Malaysia as well as its largest city.
